law.text: Only persons approved under KRS 17.500 to 17.580 and 17.991 may be known as approved providers in the Commonwealth of Kentucky, or use any words or letters or assume any titles or description tending to convey the impression that they are approved providers.
law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 10, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 401, sec. 25, effective April 11, 2000. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 148, effective July 15, 1998.
